content: provides Top Hat. Table 2-3 IBM z16 Model A01 cabling Feature Code combinations A vertical cable management guide (“spine”) can assist with proper cable management for fiber, copper, and coupling cables. A top to bottom spine is present from manufacturing with cable organizer clips that are installed for frames Z and C when present. Frames A and B contain mini-spines that serve the same purpose. The cable retention clips can be relocated for best usage. All external cabling to the system (from top or bottom) can use the spines to minimize interference with the PDUs that are mounted on the sides of the rack. Environment Bottom exit Top exit Feature Code Comments Raised Floor Yes No 7899 only Bottom FQC support only Raised Floor Yes Yes (no Top Hat) 7899 and 7816 Bottom FQC support only Raised Floor Yes Yes (with Top Hat) 7899 and 7898 Top and Bottom FQC support Raised Floor No Yes (no Top Hat) 7816  No FQC support  Ships bottom seal plate Raised Floor No Yes (with Top Hat) 7898  Top
